page.title: 13Government affecting Nailsea
page.content: Nailsea has three authorities affecting its life;- {Nailsea Town Council}which decides on matters of local concern such as playing fields, footpaths, rights of way etc. It meets at the Town Council Offices just off the High Street. It works closely with, or disagrees with.... {Woodspring District Council}which governs such things as leisure facilities, main street lighting, town planning etc. It meets in the old Town Hall of Weston-super-mare. It works closely with, or disagrees with..... {Avon County Council}(or the{County of {Avon}as it prefers to be known) which decides on such matters as education, highways, area planning etc.. Avon County was formed in 1974 and is unpopular with a minority in Nailsea who'd prefer to be part of{Somerset!
